changes.description: Fix stop rotation events not being detected with deCONZ.
Fix deCONZ events not being recognized.
Make `helper_last_controller_event` a mandatory input to simplify setup and enable future advanced features. When updating, provide a dedicated input_text entity for this input.
ðŸŽ‰ Add Debouncing support to avoid duplicate action runs.
Prevent undesired endless loops by running loop actions a finite number of times, configurable through two new blueprint inputs.
Use any RAW stop event (left/right) to identify the stop event corresponding to the current remote rotation.
Fix inputs wrongly marked as required.
Fix Zigbee2MQTT reporting null state changes.
Fix deCONZ rotation stop events not being properly recognized.
Standardize blueprint structure and input naming across the collection. Improve blueprint documentation. No functionality change.
Optimize characters usage for the `helper_last_controller_event` text input.

Migrate to Zigbee2MQTT MQTT Device Triggers. The `controller_entity` input is deprecated and `controller_device` is now mandatory. Remove `controller_entity` from your automation and configure `controller_device` with your controller device ID. (Thanks [@yarafie](https://github.com/yarafie))
Standardize input naming format for controller devices and virtual button actions. No functionality changes.
Improve Last Controller Event Helper JSON Regex with more lenient matching.
